spiritsExplanation: The workout is identified as a "Whole Body Circuit" with a focus on both dumbbells and rowing, implying a high-energy and intense format. The inclusion of hip hop and global hits music genres suggests an energetic setting. The circuit format and maximum rhythm of 24 further indicate a structured and disciplined approach, suitable for a circuit training session designed to work the whole body within a set timeframe. The inclusion of rowing, albeit for a short duration, typically requires consistent pacing and rhythm, which influences the slight presence of "Flow & Rhythm." Overall, the combination of equipment, music genre, and exercise format justifies the primary spirits as "High-Energy & Intense" and "Structured & Disciplined," with a moderate presence of "Flow & Rhythm."
